TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PanelStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style

summary.span: 表示 控制項的樣式。

span.span: Represents the style for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來表示面板控制項的樣式設定。The class is used to represent the style settings for a panel control. 它將封裝的屬性來控制面板的外觀，並可以套用至多個面板控制項，以提供常見的外觀。It encapsulates the properties that control the appearance of a panel and can be applied to multiple panel controls to provide a common appearance. 您可以指定要設定顯示在面板的背景影像屬性。You can specify an image to display in the background of the panel by setting the property. 面板的內容的水平對齊會由屬性。The horizontal alignment of the contents of the panel is indicated by the property. 可以設定，來指定包含面板控制項中的文字之控制項的方向屬性。The direction of controls that contain text within the panel control can be specified by setting the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立物件和設定其屬性。The following code example demonstrates creating a object and setting its properties. 這個範例有兩個部分：This example has two parts: 部分類別中， `PanelStylecs_aspx`，可示範如何建立新物件和設定其屬性。A partial class, `PanelStylecs_aspx`, that demonstrates creating a new object and setting its properties. 使用的 Web Form 網頁`PanelStylecs_aspx`範例為其程式碼後置檔案。A Web Forms page that uses the `PanelStylecs_aspx` example as its code-behind file. 此範例的第一個部分會示範如何建立物件`myPanelStyle`，然後設定其屬性。The first part of the example demonstrates creating a object, `myPanelStyle`, and setting its properties. 然後在方法針對同時呼叫`Panel1`面板和`Panel2`面板中，和`myPanelStyle`套用至這兩種。Then the method is called for both the `Panel1` panel and the `Panel2` panel, and `myPanelStyle` is applied to both of them. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)] 此範例的第二部分顯示前面的範例使用.aspx 檔案。The second part of the example shows an .aspx file that is used with the previous example. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定面板控制項背景影像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the background image for the panel control.

value.span: 面板控制項背景影像的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the background image for the panel control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定面板控制項的背景影像的 URL。The property specifies the URL of the background image for the panel control. 此屬性才能運作，映像檔必須存在於指定的位置。For this property to work, an image file must exist at the specified location. 如果無法存取指定的影像檔案，則會顯示面板控制項沒有背景影像。If the specified image file is not accessible, then the panel control is displayed without a background image. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例適用於兩個面板控制項，相同的背景影像`Panel1`和`Panel2`。The following code example applies the same background image to two panel controls, `Panel1` and `Panel2`. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須提供自己的映像。For this example to work correctly, you must provide your own image. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)]

param.name: s
param.span: 物件，表示要複製的樣式設定。

span.span: A object that represents the style settings to copy.

summary.span: 為 類別目前的執行個體，複製指定的 物件的樣式屬性。

span.span: Duplicates the style properties of the specified object for the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用方法來複製指定的樣式設定物件目前的執行個體類別。You can use the method to duplicate the style settings of the specified object for the current instance of the class. 方法會複製非空白項目從指定物件`s`。The method copies non-blank elements from the specified object, `s`. 中所定義的任何項目`s`取代任何項目中定義物件。Any element that is defined in `s` replaces any element that is defined in the object. 若要取代只有留白，在這些樣式設定物件，請使用方法。To replace only those style settings left blank in the object, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection Direction { get; set; }

member this.Direction : System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定在面板控制項中包含文字的控制項之顯示方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction in which to display controls that include text in a panel control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定要在其中顯示包含面板控制項中文字的控制項的方向。The property specifies the direction in which to display controls that include text in a panel control. 屬性會設定使用其中一種值。The property is set using one of the values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未設定內容的方向。The content direction is not set.| |`LeftToRight`|子控制項包含文字，會從左向右顯示右邊。Child controls that include text are displayed from left to right.| |`RightToLeft`|由右至左顯示的子控制項包含文字。Child controls that include text are displayed from right to left.| 如果您指定，包含文字的子控制項顯示從左到右。If you specify , child controls that include text display from left to right. 如果您指定，包含文字的子控制項顯示由右至左。If you specify , child controls that include text display right to left. 使用來顯示其文字由右至左，例如阿拉伯文或希伯來文書寫的語言。Use to display text for languages that are written from right to left, such as Arabic or Hebrew. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性的兩個面板控制項，`Panel1`和`Panel2`至`ContentDirection.LeftToRight`列舉值。The following code example sets the properties of two panel controls, `Panel1` and `Panel2`, to the `ContentDirection.LeftToRight` enumeration value. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)]

exception.span: 這個方向不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The direction is not one of the values.

summary.span: 取得或設定在面板控制項中內容的水平對齊。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the contents within a panel control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定到面板控制項中之內容的水平對齊。The property specifies the horizontal alignment of the contents within a panel control. 屬性會設定使用其中一種列舉值。The property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|水平對齊未設定。The horizontal alignment is not set.| |`Left`|面板的內容是靠左對齊。The contents of the panel are left-aligned.| |`Center`|面板的內容會置中對齊。The contents of the panel are centered.| |`Right`|面板的內容靠右對齊。The contents of the panel are right-aligned.| > [!NOTE] > 。. 如果屬性設定為但屬性設定包含 panel 控制項的控制項，此設定繼承自包含控制項。If the property is set to but the property is set in the control that contains the panel control, the setting is inherited from the containing control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性的兩個面板控制項，`Panel1`和`Panel2`至`HorizontalAlign.Center`列舉值。The following code example sets the properties of two panel controls, `Panel1` and `Panel2`, to the `HorizontalAlign.Center` enumeration value. .Aspx 檔案可以用來執行此範例，請參閱主題。For an .aspx file that can be used to run the example, see the topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)]

exception.span: 水平對齊不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The horizontal alignment is not one of the values.

param.name: s
param.span: 物件，表示要與 物件結合的樣式設定。

span.span: A object that represents the style settings to combine with the object.

summary.span: 將指定 物件的樣式設定與 類別目前的執行個體結合。

span.span: Combines the style settings of the specified object with the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用方法，將合併指定的樣式設定物件與目前的執行個體類別。You can use the method to combine the style settings of the specified object with the current instance of the class. 方法會複製非空白項目從指定物件`s`，但不會取代任何現有的樣式設定中物件。The method copies non-blank elements from the specified object, `s`, but does not replace any existing style settings in the object. 若要取代中的樣式設定物件中的樣式設定`s`，使用方法。To replace the style settings in the object with the style settings in `s`, use the method.

summary.span: 取得或設定在面板控制項中捲軸的可視性和位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the visibility and position of scroll bars in a panel control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性面板控制項中指定的可見性和捲軸位置。The property specifies the visibility and position of scroll bars in a panel control. 屬性會設定使用其中一種列舉值。The property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|不顯示捲軸。No scroll bars are shown.| |`Horizontal`|只有水平捲軸會顯示。Only a horizontal scroll bar is shown.| |`Vertical`|垂直捲軸會顯示。Only a vertical scroll bar is shown.| |`Both`|同時顯示水平和垂直捲軸。Both horizontal and vertical scroll bars are shown.| |`Auto`|如有必要，水平、 垂直或這兩個捲軸會顯示。If necessary, horizontal, vertical, or both scroll bars are shown. 否則不顯示捲軸。Otherwise, no scroll bars are shown.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性的兩個面板控制項，`Panel1`和`Panel2`至`ScrollBars.Both`列舉值。The following code example sets the properties of two panel controls, `Panel1` and `Panel2`, to the `ScrollBars.Both` enumeration value. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)]

exception.span: 屬性不是其中一個 值。

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指示面板中的內容是否換行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the content wraps within the panel.

value.span: 如果面板中的內容換行，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the content wraps within the panel; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性指示的內容是否換行面板中。The property indicates whether the content wraps within the panel. 當屬性設定為`false`和屬性設定為，面板的內容長度超過面板的內容會出現在同一行以水平捲軸列適合在面板中，如果。When the property is set to `false` and the property is set to , if the content of the panel is longer than what will fit in the panel, the content of the panel will appear on one line with a horizontal scroll bar. 當屬性設定為`false`和屬性設定為、 面板會延伸，而且網頁上如有必要將具有水平捲軸。When the property is set to `false` and the property is set to , the panel will extend and if necessary the Web page will have a horizontal scroll bar. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性`false`的兩個面板控制項`Panel1`和`Panel2`。The following code example sets the property to `false` for two panel controls, `Panel1` and `Panel2`. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)]
